amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit loans in excess of $1 billion to a foreign country from the Treasury Department's exchange stabilization fund unless approved by Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit loans or credit in excess of $1 billion to a foreign entity or government through the exchange stabilization fund unless approved by Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 228 (Roll no. 304).
